page.title: 14THE MARTINS HOUSING ESTATE
page.content: 'THE MARTINS' IS A NEW HOUSING ESTATE OFF LONGFORD LANE. THERE ARE 67 MCLEAN HOUSES, 88 WESTBURY HOUSES AND 34 UNIT CONSTRUC- TION HOUSES. ALTOGETHER THEY MAKE A TOTAL OF 189 HOMES. THERE IS A NEW BY-PASS CALLED THE NORTHERN BY-PASS WHICH SEPARATES 'THE MARTINS' FROM INNSWORTH. THE ESTATE IS BUILT ON AGRICULTURAL LAND WHICH USED TO BE PART OF FIELD FARM. THE AREA WHICH THE ESTATE IS ON IS CALLED ALDER'S GREEN. THE HOUSES ARE DETACHED AND SEMI- DETACHED AND HAVE 2, 3 OR 4 BEDROOMS. THEY ARE PRIVATE HOUSES AND FOR SALE, NOT FOR RENT. MOST OF THEM ARE OCCUPIED ALREADY.
